item.title: Automated screenshots in Flutter (without pain)
item.description: Generating screenshots in Flutter. Generating screenshots in Flutter. Pre-made libraries and other ways My solution Step 1. Adding dependencies Step 2. Create test file Step 3. Write tests Ending Pre-made libraries and other ways I’m building my app with Flutter called sudoku. Just before the first release I found out that I have no screenshots for my app. I had two options to make them: By hand Automate that task My app grows quickly and interface changes fast, which means that screenshotting by hand is dumb idea.
